coreAttributes.name: Longbow
coreAttributes.description: While most bows require arrows, this longbow seems to have the string enchanted to create arcane arrows straight from your aura. It is made of a long, treated shaft of wood, and the string is strong and taut.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: you knock an arrow and let it loose at [npc2.name].

hitDescriptions.hitText: Loosing an arrow with [npc.her] longbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a shot on [npc2.name] in the chest!
Letting loose an arrow with [npc.her] longbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land an arrow of pure arcane in [npc2.name]'s body!

missDescriptions.missText: Loosing an arrow with [npc.her] longbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] towards [npc2.name] chest, but [npc.verb(end)] arrow went wide past [npc2.herHim]!
